message.body: Bet ur happy bout that..even has a prescription for adderall.sp?
Lol. I am happy, and actually think it was not a bad move except for the three years. Too long for an older catcher
I still like stanton..not bryd..guess he has a lil right handed pop..
The Byrd signing only makes sense if they use him as a platoon guy, which they won't. They need an outfielder who can actually catch. Revere can't cover the entire field!
